description: Source code for the MenuScreen widget in a Flutter application, implementing a menu with category filtering, item display, and navigation to item details.

classes.name: MenuScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the menu with category filters.

classes.name: _MenuScreenState
classes.description: State managing category selection and UI updates.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Widget displaying the category selection header.

classes.name: _MenuCard
classes.description: Widget representing individual menu item cards with image and action buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MenuScreen and child widgets.

methods.name: onTap
methods.description: Handles tap on menu item to navigate to detail screen.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an item to the cart via CartProvider.
